author: Lucy Clarke-Billings
title: Stunning Kate Middleton arrives at London BAFTA Awards in gorgeous Alexander McQueen dress alongside Prince William - Mirror Online
text:
News Stunning Kate Middleton arrives at London BAFTA Awards in gorgeous Alexander McQueen dress alongside Prince William British royalty is sharing the spotlight with Hollywood royalty tonight as William and Kate brace London's freezing conditions alongside A-list celebs Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Prince Williams and Kate have arrived at the star-studded London BAFTA Awards. 
The royal couple are attending the British Academy Film Awards at the Royal Albert Hall for the first time as a couple. 
Dapper William, who is president of the prestigious British academy, walked the red carpet with his stunning wife , who was dressed in a black and white flowery Alexander McQueen dress with a gorgeous Bardot neckline. 
Her coiffed brunette hair was pinned up, revealing sparkling, dangly diamond earrings. 
During the ceremony, the Duke and Duchess of Cambridge will meet representatives of the A-list event. Read More 
The second in line to the throne is also due to present the fellowship award. This is the highest accolade bestowed by the academy and recognises outstanding and exceptional contribution to the big screen. 
Suited-and-booted Wills has been the president of the academy since February 2010. 
The nominees were revealed earlier this month with La La Land leading the way with 11 category nods. Like us on Facebook
